p: Animals (Swiss albino mice) of both sexes (25–35 g) were procured from the Jahangirnagar University, Dhaka-1342, Bangladesh. The animals were housed according to standard guidelines (room temperature, 25 ± 2 °C; relative humidity, 55–60%, 12 h light/dark cycle) and provided sufficient meal and water supplies. For the in vivo tests, the mice were managed with the laboratory conditions for 14 days. The institutional animal ethical committee, Department of Pharmacy, International Islamic University Chittagong, Bangladesh approved the experimental study as stated by the governmental guidelines under the reference Pharm-P&D-61/08′16-130 [ 38].
